a0.speaker: Marisa:
a0.dialogue: What the... why are you here again?

a1.speaker: Marisa:
a1.dialogue: Are you going to give me a dirty look and then proceed to do nickel-worthy filthy acts?

a2.speaker: Raiko:
a2.dialogue: Can you please mind that there is some serious matter going on? I must warn you: one more step and you will be dead.

a3.speaker: Marisa:
a3.dialogue: This is the look of a liar! I can definitely see through it.

a4.speaker: Raiko:
a4.dialogue: First, you think that praising the Lord of Hosts is criminally underrated. Now that you're seeing me as a liar...

a5.speaker: Raiko:
a5.dialogue: Fine! One last warning: You can defeat me again, but you won't defeat who you'll face next!
